subproject.corporate outcome: National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services
subproject.description: The assistance will support relevant government entities involved in the public sector reform program in designing tools and processes to:  assess selected institutions’ readiness to implement the Service Delivery improvement system;  design capacity building packages for these institutions; develop, set and publish standards and to monitor performance against standards. Additionally, the project will provide assistance in linking the performance improvement systems at policy and operational levels and in the development of a national strategy to implement SDIS government-wide.
subproject.title: Support to PSRD

title: Support to the Capacity of the Public Sector Reform
